text: I cooked adobo for her, it's a Filipino dish of pork with soy sauce and vinegar haha
Honestly, it's tiring but I love my grandmother, so for me, my tiredness disappears when I see her happy haha
that's really sweet, honestly. adobo sounds good too, i've heard of it but never tried it haha
oh yes. actually, adobo is popular here in the philippines, but i don't like to eat it often. I rarely eat this, only on special occasions ðŸ˜†
haha wait so you cook it for her but you don't even like eating it yourself? that's dedication
Actually, after I cooked at grandma's house earlier, I went home to cook food for my parents, so I didn't eat at grandma's house earlier, hehe
haha wow so you cooked for your grandma then went home and cooked again for your parents? you're basically a full-time chef at this point
oh when I went to the beach last time haha, i had many pics in the beach these past few months while wearing a differents bikinis. maybe i'll send you later since it's on my other phone hahaha
yes, but it's okay because cooking is one of my hobbies haha
wait you're sending bikini pics? haha okay now I'm curious
oh I just open it again ðŸ˜†
have you eaten?
haha yeah just been busy with work. nah not yet, probably gonna grab something soon though. you?
yeah just finished eating actually haha. had some curry rice from the konbini, nothing fancy
ohh okay okay got it haha, i haven't eaten yet. i'm still cooking lunch. since I need to cook a lot now because there are guests coming here haha
oh nice, guests on a wednesday? haha must be something special
yes actually my fam from another province will be visiting here for the celebration tomorrow for valentines day so i have no choice but to not go to work for 2 days ðŸ˜†
oh wait so you're off for valentines day haha. family taking priority over the cosmetics store I see ðŸ˜†
hahaha yes, here valentines day is important so i want to celebrate it with my fam since i dont have a bf here ðŸ˜‚
btw i'm still waiting on those bikini pics haha, wanna see them already
